synopsis.text:
And so begins the journey of Ai Shiomi, an uncertain young man stepping into the world of the Psychic Academy, a prestigious institution dedicated to honing the paranormal abilities of gifted individuals. In this futuristic society, a person's worth is measured by their aura, a special power that sets them apart from the ordinary. Ai's older brother, Zero, a legend in his own right, has left a formidable legacy for Ai to follow.

As Ai navigates the complexities of the Academy, he finds himself surrounded by a diverse group of individuals, each with their own unique abilities and motivations. Among them is Orina, a childhood friend harboring deep feelings for Ai, and the enigmatic Myu, whose past is shrouded in mystery and seems to have a peculiar connection with Ai.

In this chaotic environment, Ai grapples with his own self-doubt and the pressure to live up to his brother's reputation. As he learns to harness his aura and unravel the enigma of the "aura of light," he finds himself caught in a web of love, friendship, and the supernatural. Will Ai be able to step out of his brother's shadow and carve his own path in this world of psychics? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
